description: These sweet and sticky wings have a slight hint of spice added too.
keywords: Chicken wings,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Bangkok Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium mango, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat with the canola oil and fry the wings for 10 minutes, turning halfway.
Add the mango, sriracha, lime, salt and coconut milk to the pan, cover and allow to simmer for 10 minutes. Stir occasionally.
reduce the sauce until there is a nice thick coating on the wings.
